function: Display real-time solar power generation data on the dashboard.
static_description: A card component with a honeydew background and dark olive green text showing the current solar power generation value in kW. Includes an icon referenced as 'solarIcon'.

interaction_and_states.description: Component fetches latest solar power generation data from '/api/solar/realtime' upon initialization.

function: Display real-time power consumption data on the dashboard.
static_description: A card component with a honeydew background and dark olive green text showing the current power consumption value in kW. Includes an icon referenced as 'consumptionIcon'.

interaction_and_states.description: Component fetches latest power consumption data from '/api/consumption/realtime' upon initialization.

function: Display real-time battery percentage data on the dashboard.
static_description: A card component with a honeydew background and dark olive green text showing the current battery charge level as a percentage (%). Includes an icon referenced as 'batteryIcon'.

interaction_and_states.description: Component fetches latest battery percentage data from '/api/battery/realtime' upon initialization.

function: Automatically update all real-time data at regular intervals.
static_description: No visible element; this defines periodic API calls every 5 seconds to refresh displayed real-time metrics.

interaction_and_states.description: At each interval, re-fetches real-time data from respective endpoints and updates corresponding UI components.

function: Allow users to query historical solar data using date range selection.
static_description: Date range picker component allowing selection of start and end dates. Submit button triggers data retrieval for selected period.

interaction_and_states.description: User selects start and end date using calendar widgets.
Submits selected date range to '/api/historical/data' to retrieve filtered historical records.

function: Visualize historical solar power generation trends using charts.
static_description: Line chart displaying solar power generation over time. X-axis shows timestamps, Y-axis shows power values in kW.

interaction_and_states.description: Fetches historical solar trend data from '/api/historical/solar-trends' after date range is submitted.
Displays tooltip with exact timestamp and value when hovering over data points.

function: Visualize historical power consumption trends using charts.
static_description: Line chart displaying power consumption over time. X-axis shows timestamps, Y-axis shows consumption values in kW.

interaction_and_states.description: Fetches historical consumption trend data from '/api/historical/consumption-trends' after date range is submitted.
Displays tooltip with exact timestamp and value when hovering over data points.

function: Visualize historical battery percentage trends using charts.
static_description: Line chart displaying battery percentage over time. X-axis shows timestamps, Y-axis shows percentage values.

interaction_and_states.description: Fetches historical battery trend data from '/api/historical/battery-trends' after date range is submitted.
Displays tooltip with exact timestamp and value when hovering over data points.

resource_dependency.realTimeDataSchema: Table 'real_time_metrics' with columns: id (SERIAL PRIMARY KEY), metric_type (VARCHAR), value (FLOAT), recorded_at (TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW())

function: Serve real-time solar data via backend API endpoints.
static_description: RESTful GET endpoint returning latest real-time metrics stored in PostgreSQL database under schema 'real_time_metrics'.

interaction_and_states.description: Returns most recent solar power generation entry from database.
Returns most recent power consumption entry from database.
Returns most recent battery percentage entry from database.

resource_dependency.historicalDataSchema: Table 'historical_metrics' with columns: id (SERIAL PRIMARY KEY), metric_type (VARCHAR), value (FLOAT), recorded_at (TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE)

function: Serve historical solar data via backend API endpoints.
static_description: RESTful GET endpoint returning historical metrics within requested date range from PostgreSQL database under schema 'historical_metrics'.

interaction_and_states.description: Returns filtered historical entries between provided timestamps.
Returns only solar power generation records for trend analysis.
Returns only power consumption records for trend analysis.
Returns only battery percentage records for trend analysis.

resource_dependency.pgDatabaseConfig: PostgreSQL connection using node-postgres (pg) library with environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME

function: Establish secure connection to external PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables.
static_description: No visible element; configures database client pool using provided credentials.

function: Apply honeydew background color across entire application interface.
static_description: Entire page background rendered in honeydew (#F0FFF0).

function: Style all UI components with consistent dark olive green theme.
static_description: All dashboard cards and chart containers use dark olive green (#556B2F) for text and borders.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: "install:all": "cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install"

function: Configure package.json script to install dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously.
static_description: 'scripts' section in root package.json includes command that sequentially runs npm install in frontend and backend directories.

resource_dependency.concurrentStartScript: "dev": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm run dev\" \"cd backend && npm run dev\""

function: Configure package.json script to start both frontend and backend development servers concurrently.
static_description: 'scripts' section in root package.json uses 'concurrently' package to launch frontend and backend dev servers together.
